Direct Known Subclasses:
DBF_File, SHP_File, SHX_File
public abstract class ShapeFileReader
extends java.lang.Object

base class for Shape-File-Readers. (*.shx, *.shp, *.dbf, ...).

Author:
thomas diewald (2012).
